attributes.action: Add "Immigration" to the category headings on the Prime Ministers e-petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Immigration is an extremely important topic area and has been left off the category list. This is probably because it tends to raise objections from the liberal sections of our society. Assuming the category of "immigration" is added, I would urge people of GB to use it!

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
